name: com.niantic.lightship.maps
description: This library is used to stream and render Niantic MapTiles. Various sample scenes, starter prefabs, and sample code are also provided.

samples.description: A sample demonstrating a top-down view of the map using an orthographic camera.
A sample demonstrating a third-person camera that follows and orbits around the player or other focused object.
A simple resource game using Lightship Maps. The game shows the use of Map Feature data to place objects for gameplay, as well as dynamically placing player-created objects on the map.
A sample demonstrating how to render a map into a render texture using a secondary camera. Useful for applications with embedded maps or mini-maps.
A sample demonstrating custom MapLayers with components that draw polygons and lines on the map.
A sample showing the use of multiple visual themes that can be changed at runtime.
A sample that demonstrates the use of MapTile feature labels.  NOTE: The labeling system is an experimental feature.  Please see the online documentation for details.

A sample that demonstrates the use of MapTile feature labels in different languages and scripts.  NOTE: The labeling system is an experimental feature.  Please see the online documentation for details.
